definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: In the distant targets at the same time, don't think slightingly of the nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在瞄準遙遠目標的同時，不要輕視近處的東西。

sentences.english: How to get to the nearest subway station?
sentences.chinese: 如何從金橋回到龍陽路或近處的地鐵站？

sentences.english: Leaves of banyans nearby are so bright after the rain wash.
sentences.chinese: 近處的榕樹銀杏經過雨水的滋潤之後更顯得光鮮。

sentences.english: I come to gaze upon your windows near at hand.
sentences.chinese: 我到您窗子下面的近處來望望。

sentences.english: In the foreground lay golden fields and copses glittering in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色的田野和小樹林在近處閃閃發亮。

sentences.english: It towered like a giant above all the other tree near by.
sentences.chinese: 它像巨人般地高聳在近處的林木間。

sentences.english: Two of the missing items were recovered nearby and were slightly damaged.
sentences.chinese: 兩件丟失的藏品在近處重新尋回，已輕微破損。

sentences.english: The little dot near the centre is the decimal point.
sentences.chinese: 怪圈中心近處的那個小圓圈，就是小數點。

sentences.english: And still those voices are calling from far away.
sentences.chinese: 這些聲響仍然在近處咿咿呀呀。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
